name: Ironman & X-O Manowar in Heavy Metal [PSX]
description:
Ironman/X-O Manowar in 'Heavy Metal' is an action game developed by Realtime Associates and Marvel Comics. It was originally released in 1996. Acclaim published the game.
Ironman/X-O Manowar in 'Heavy Metal' is available on PC, Game Gear, Game Boy and SEGA Saturn.
